name: Apartment No.9 BxG Version
description:
Help Rue find happiness or lead him to ruin in this dark slice-of-life story about a teacher whose life is turned upside down when the homeless girl he often stares at out of his window shows up at his door, claiming to have found his wallet.

This is the BxG version of a game I made for Otome Jam 2021. I wanted to get this alternate version finished for sunofes jam. It is based on a script from the anthology series 'Inside No.9'.

Features
  • Original sprites, CGs, & soundtrack
  • Fully voice acted (Rue's voice is currently missing and will be patched later when the VA has time to record)
  • New game+ with extended & new endings
  • 14 different endings depending on your choices
  • Casual choices & choices with consequences
  • 2 love interests
  • Endings gallery & other unlockables
Warnings/Triggers
  • Mild suggestive/NSFW scenes (no nudity - written/spoken - avoidable with choices)
  • Physical violence
  • Depictions of blood
  • Self-harm & suicide
The Characters Bugs & Stuff

Feel free to head here if you find a bug. Need help getting the game to open on Mac? Check out this post I made with a few possible fixes!

Walkthrough

Need help getting all the endings? Check out this walkthrough that I made. It's relatively spoiler-free :3

Other Notes

The soundtrack was made while wearing headphones, as I don't have any speakers x3 So if you're playing without headphones, you may need to adjust the sound somewhat to get the best experience. I do recommend playing with headphones though.

I hope it is okay to submit this to sunofes. I'm not sure where it stands with the no sex rule. There is no sex or nudity in this game. And there is no suggestive artwork either. But there are a couple of written/voice scenes of a mildly sexual nature which can be avoided with choices.

The Team

Writer/Creator/OST - Melancholy Marionette
Sprite & CG Artist - Lazy Polar Bear
UI Artist - maneki-mushi
Window Moon Background Artists - sophrossynes & LazyCrocodile
Additional Character Concepts - Desichan

The Cast

Akuji - CloudyDecember
Perry - Casey Schryer
Fleur - Megan "The Fangirl" Gotham - @The_Fanily
Doctor 01 - Nicolle Zambrano
Doctor 02 - XepherStar

Thank you so much to everyone who helped me bring this project to life! I love you all and wish I could give you big squeezy cuddles <3 I hope that you will have as much fun playing the game as I did making it :3 If you enjoyed playing through the game (or even if you didn't xD), I'd really appreciate hearing your feedback in the comments + ratings are much appreciated too ^-^
